title: TYVM!
body:
Well I have to say.. i am super happy to say that im glad im still playing here! I had a major login issue that was resolved and to come in and get a zombie ryze skin for free! Damn! 

For me im super picky for skins..... Im sure RIOT can track my spending but that is one im keen on for sure.... the only thing that could best it is the legendary ezreal skin lol
